text:
Pillars of fire rise high into the sky.
The sirens of fire trucks echo.

No matter how many countermeasures are taken,
there has never been a year without a fire.

On this day too, the firefighters are working
desperately to extinguish a fiercely burning fire.

As ashes blow up into the sky, a child's cry for help
leaks out from inside the building.

name: Firefighter
text:
Ma'am, you can't... !
I understand how you feel, but it's too dangerous!!

name: Firefighter
text:
...!!?
You, stop right there—!!

It was in the middle of a struggle, as the firefighters tried to stop
a civilian who was about to go back inside to help.

Someone, with a light and elegant step,
stepped into the flames, as if it was a ballroom.

Some time has passed since then.
Around the time the clock struck 24, the fire was finally extinguished.

What happened to the child,
and the person who went to save them? At that moment—

Covered in ashes from head to toe, 'she' calmly made her appearance from the ruins.
Holding a child who had cried themselves to sleep—

After handing the child to their mother, 'she' tries to leave.
Leaving alone with the midnight bell, the figure looking like a 'cinder-covered' person—
Prologue

—Akihabara Fire Station.
It is also the base of operations for the city's youth fire brigade.

Together with active firefighters, 'Firefighting University Students',
the local brigade members conduct their daily training.

Tokyo Firefighting University is a unique academy in Tokyo—
While they are students, they are also active civil servants.

Along with the Oniou Police Academy in the west,
they are a cornerstone in protecting the peace of this Tokyo.

Among the elite firefighting university students who have survived
the rigorous training in such a place and are honing their skills—

Two Transients were standing out from the crowd.
The next training is to climb a rope with only arm strength while carrying a sandbag.

name: Elderly Female Firefighter?
text:
—Here, a handicap. I'll climb with just one hand.
Are you ready, Reddy?

name: Wolf in Red Riding Hood?
text:
Don't underestimate me, old hag. Today's the day I'll eat you up, alright?
Gurangatch, give us the signal!!

name: Elderly Female Firefighter?
text:
I'm not the type to die just because I'm eaten, you know?
I'm the kind of woman who can survive even from inside your stomach.

name: Elderly Female Firefighter?
text:
But if you're prepared to follow me even
if it means you'd get covered in blood, then bring it on!

name: Gurangatch
text:
Roger that~
Alright~, on your marks—

Grangachi put the whistle in his mouth, and things went silent.
And then, with a sudden, sharp sound—

name: Gurangatch
text:
Wow, you two are fast.
As expected of our fire chief and ace.

name: Gurangatch
text:
Captain Cinderella is even competing with one hand.
It's not like she has wings or anything... That's insane.

name: Elderly Female Firefighter?
text:
Phew, to keep up with me,
you must have trained a lot, haven't you, Reddy?

name: Little Red Riding Hood Wolf?
text:
I'm happy that I can finally compete with a one-handed Sandra...
But I still have a long way to go.

name: Gurangatch
text:
That's amazing~.
I'm good at diving, but climbing is a different story—

name: Elderly Female Firefighter?
text:
Then how about we train together?
I'll join you, Gurangatch.

name: Little Red Riding Hood Wolf?
text:
Sandra's training is honestly incredibly tough.
As long as you're not used to it, you'll feel like you've turned to ash, just like that of a manga—

name: Gurangatch
text:
Uhh, that doesn't sound very nice...
Just watching is enough for me—

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
Yo, everyone!
It sure seems lively at my workplace today, isn't it?

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
Please don't be so surprised just because I came to training...
Is it perhaps because of my usual behavior?

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
But I did properly work today, alright?
Securing personnel for a recent busy security request...
And with that, an announcement for everyone.

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
Together with my junior, Akiha-chan,
I've found some new help!

On a certain day in Tokyo,
where the sweltering heat still lingered.

[Player] visits a shared space in Akihabara
for a certain appointment.

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
Yo, [Player]!
Here, here, thank you very much for coming.

name: Akiha Gongen
text:
I've been asking you for a while,
but I'm really happy you're actually joining the fire brigade!

options.text: Because you asked me to, Akiha.
I've been interested for a while.
I recently went through a fire myself.

note:
oh my god it's branching paths again
this will affect the immediate dialogue, plus ONE dialogue option down the line
